topic.title: 问个有关注册.bit域名之后的问题.
topic.body: 当我注册了个.bit域名之后：（1）我需要为这个这个域名续费吗？（2）当我换了电脑后，只保存有注册这个.bit域名的namecoin收款地址，怎么才能用这个地址呢？（3）我该怎么用这个收款地址更新我的.bit网站？增设二级域名？《ps：麻烦前辈回答一下，谢谢。我是小白，回答越多越好》

topic.title: NameCoin news
topic.body:
News from namecoin.org

2017-03-03 ICANN has invited a Namecoin developer to speak at the ICANN58 meeting on March 11-16 2017 in Copenhagen, and I’m happy to say that I’ve accepted their invitation. Since I’m well aware that this may be surprising to some readers, I think it’s beneficial to everyone to announce it here, and give some details about why I’ll be attending.

[Read more…](https://www.namecoin.org/2017/03/03/icann-58.html)

2017-03-03 As a result of an invitation from Riccardo Spagni (AKA fluffypony of Monero), I will be speaking at the “Practical Cryptography & Blockchains: Beyond the Hype” track at QCon London 2017 (March 6-8 2017). My talk is entitled “Case Study: Alternate Blockchains”. I will also be on a panel discussion alongside Paul Sztorc, David Vorick, Elaine Ou, Peter Todd, and Riccardo Spagni.
[myHub 点一下](/1ABFCaadiEa3bFNzN3RcCZSsviqMNTbz3m)

1_17LQPJZz9sBC1besM5ZwKFKt9CmndJTjcA.body:
> [00d4n1](#comment_13_1Mr36Z4TSbWQ236NfvRPeLn3qsAwngBzMd): ZeroNet needs a blacklist option so that I don't have to seed anti-Semitic garbage like this.

You can do it by click [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1ABFCaadiEa3bFNzN3RcCZSsviqMNTbz3m/1GNgaj5EqkzqYECYbXa889fGLyuseHRi3t/1489552824) :)

> [00d4n1] does that actually stop me from seeding content published by that user, or just hide it?

Just hide it,hide his/her messages in the whole ZeroNet,so if you block he/she,you can NOT see he/her anymore.Because of you have NOT his/her private key ,so you can NOT delete it . Say something is his/her freedom.

> [00d4n1]Freedom of speech doesn't imply freedom to make innocent non-Nazis' computers spread your speech, y'know?

Maybe the only way you can do to NOT seeding the contents you don't like is to delete the whole site :)
